text: Deposed Queen Yun (, 1445? August 16, 1482) was a queen of Joseon Dynasty. She was the second wife of King Seongjong. She was the mother of Yeonsangun of Joseon. == References == * http://people.aks.ac.kr/front/tabCon/ppl/pplView.aks?pplId=PPL_6JOa_A1445_2_0019315 * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=181894 * http://www.ohmynews.com/NWS_Web/view/at_pg.aspx?CNTN_CD=A0000839977 Category:1440s births Category:1482 deaths Category:Korean politicians Category:Executed people
title: Deposed Queen Yun
